Events.OnCreate:
(block (gateList)
(switch ; Find a stargate more than 400 light-seconds away (not (setq gateList (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "GR:400; -uncharted;"))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'gateID (objGetID (random gateList)))
(msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 250) ) ) )
Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (travelTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance cscObj gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) )
; Add some enemy ships patrolling around the stargate (for i 1 (random 4 6) (block (enemyObj) (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip &scSandstorm; gateObj &svAres;)) (shpOrder enemyObj 'patrol gateObj 20) ) )
(msnAddTimerEvent gSource (+ travelTime (random 0 200)) 'OnFreighterArrives) )
Events.OnFreighterArrives:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) shipObj ) (plyMessage gPlayer "Transport has arrived!")
; Create the transport (setq shipObj (sysCreateShip &scAurochs; gateObj &svCommonwealthFleet;)) (objSetIdentified shipObj) (shpOrder shipObj 'dock cscObj) (shpOrder shipObj 'wait (random 6 18)) (shpOrder shipObj 'gate)
; Register for events (msnSetData gSource 'freighterID (objGetID shipObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource shipObj)
; Update state and player target (msnSetData gSource 'state 'inbound) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource)
; Calculate travel time for setting ambush (setq travelTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance cscObj gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed shipObj)))
(sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (/ (* travelTime (random 30 50)) 100) (if (= (random 1 3) 1) gPlayerShip shipObj) (random (list &tbCSCEscort2AresAmbush; &tbCSCEscort2RogueAmbush; ) ) (random 120 200) ) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (not (msnGetData gSource 'state)) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID)) 'dock)
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'escort) )

Language.Text:
Escort a supply ship from %gateName% back to %cscName%.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %payment%

The XO walks up to you.
"Good to see you pilot. We've got a mission for you."
"A supply ship is arriving at the %gateName%. Your orders are to escort it back to %cscName% and defend it against all enemies. Carry On!\""
Language.String: "Get the hell out of here then!"
"What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!"
"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"
"Outstanding mission! Those supplies are desperately needed here."
